scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --optimize-occurence-order --optimize-dedupe && mkdir -p build/css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css build/css/ && cp src/assets/* build/ && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap/dist/fonts build/ && sed 's/node_modules[^"]*\/\([^"]*\)"/css\/\1"/;s/src\/assets\///' index.html > build/index.html
